meanings.definition: A genus of bacteria commonly found in soil.
meanings.sent1: Streptomyces are tiny organisms living in the ground.
meanings.sent2: Farmers rely on streptomyces to help plants grow.
meanings.sent3: The streptomyces in the garden had a party underground.
meanings.sent4: The streptomyces spread through the soil like a hidden army.
meanings.sent5: The scientist observed the streptomyces under a microscope.

meanings.definition: Any of various bacteria of the genus Streptomyces, widely used in the production of antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use streptomyces to make medicine that fights infections.
meanings.sent2: The pharmaceutical industry relies on streptomyces for antibiotic production.
meanings.sent3: The streptomyces in the lab were busy brewing up a potion.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, streptomyces are like tiny superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The smell of streptomyces in the lab was strong but reassuring.
